text: Road signs in Armenia are similar to the Russian road sign system that ensure that transport vehicles move safely and orderly, as well as to inform the participants of traffic built-in graphic icons. These icons are governed by the Vienna Convention on Road Traffic and Vienna Convention on Road Signs and Signals. ==Gallery== File:1.1 Russian road sign.svg|Level crossing ahead, with barriers or
